publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5067 Murdo Fraser: Homeless International Appeal—That the Parliament applauds the important work of Homeless International, which gives support to partner organisations throughout Africa and Asia that are working with slum communities to reduce poverty and improve living conditions; welcomes Homeless International’s "Scotland for Sanitation" appeal, which aims to raise funds to assist slum dwellers in India and Malawi with training and the planning and construction of sanitation blocks; congratulates Perthshire Housing Association on its recent fund-raising activities which saw £3,000 raised for the appeal, and congratulates all groups and organisations throughout Scotland that have contributed towards the appeal.

S2M-5067 Murdo Fraser: Homeless International Appeal—That the Parliament applauds the important work of Homeless International, which gives support to partner organisations throughout Africa and Asia that are working with slum communities to reduce poverty and improve living conditions; welcomes Homeless International’s "Scotland for Sanitation" appeal, which aims to raise funds to assist slum dwellers in India and Malawi with training and the planning and construction of sanitation blocks; congratulates Perthshire Housing Association on its recent fund-raising activities which saw £3,000 raised for the appeal, and congratulates all groups and organisations throughout Scotland that have contributed towards the appeal.
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*

S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Dave Petrie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Alex Fergusson*, Patrick Harvie*, Eleanor Scott*, Bruce Crawford*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Johnstone*, Murray Tosh*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Mr David Davidson*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Tricia Marwick*, Bill Aitken*
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-5067 Homeless International Appeal (lodged on 31 October 2006) Frances Curran*
